customrecordtype.description: Record will be used for users to enter requests for new vendors to be created. This functionality will only be available via the employee center

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the subsidiary the vendor will belong to
customrecordcustomfield.label: Subsidiairy

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter the name of the vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Legal Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the vendor type: Company or Individual
customrecordcustomfield.label: Type

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the standard discount terms for this vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Terms

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the currency for this vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Primary Currency

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the Vendor's primary relationship manager
customrecordcustomfield.label: Primary Relationship Manager

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the procurement owner for this vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Procurement Owner

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a parent vendor if applicable
customrecordcustomfield.label: Parent Vendor

customrecordcustomfield.help: Is the vendor a partner?
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is Partner

customrecordcustomfield.help: Is the vendor third party?
customrecordcustomfield.label: Is Third Party?

customrecordcustomfield.help: The approval status of the vendor request
customrecordcustomfield.label: Approval Status

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the post code for the Vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Post Code

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please select the Country for the Vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Country

customrecordcustomfield.help: Enter any additional comments you may have
customrecordcustomfield.label: Comments

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the name of a contact for the Vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Contact - First Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the Vendor's email address
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor's Email Address

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the Vendor's phone number
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor's Phone Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter an alternative contact number for the vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor's Alt Phone Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter a fax number for the Vendor
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor's Fax Number

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the Vendor's address
customrecordcustomfield.label: Address Line 1

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the Vendors address
customrecordcustomfield.label: Address Line 2

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the city
customrecordcustomfield.label: City

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please select the County
customrecordcustomfield.label: County

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter a reject reason
customrecordcustomfield.label: Reject Reason

customrecordcustomfield.help: This field will display the newly created Vendor when the Vendor Request has been approved.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Vendor ID

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the First Name for the Individual
customrecordcustomfield.label: First Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please enter the Last Name for the Individual
customrecordcustomfield.label: Last Name
